chapters.title: Chapter 11: An Unexpected Letter
chapters.info: Samwil Hark, p. 180—Very successful catpurse in Caemlyn. He has been caught by the Queen's Guards only because another ruffian ratted him out. The only way to be so successful a catpurse is to not be seen by those you stalk, so Elayne used him to tail Doilin Mellar at night to see where he went. He found Mellar was in league with known Darkfriends, so Elayne had him arrested. Hark is still used as a spy in Andor.
